title: Ragù alla bolognese
description: Ragù is the perfect example of Bolognese cooking: rich yet well balanced, lavish yet restrained, meaty yet fresh-tasting. This recipe follows closely the precepts of a classic ragù, but is lighter on fat. It is important to chop the vegetables finely, so that they are the size of grains of rice.
ingredients: 400g/14oz lean chuck or braising beef, coarsely minced
150ml/5fl oz red wine, such as Sangiovese or Barbera
salt and freshly ground black pepper
